item.title: Getting started with Go
item.description: Why Hello, World! Link to heading If you already know how to program and getting started on Go, the first program to write is “Hello, World!”. The basic reason for this is to ensure that the environment is all working well and you can compile and run the program without any issues. First step is to install Go based on your platform. And, below is the ‘Hello, World!’ program you can use:
